snippet.title: Split Brain - Trailer
snippet.description:
Share the same body with a friend in Split Brain. One of you controls, the other one sees, but the decisions are made together! Face the illusion and uncover the truth to find your way out of Hexarture.

Check our Steam Page Now : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3156640/Split_Brain/
